info.name: Google Classroom Dark
info.description:
DISCLAIMER: Support for this theme may be limited given that I no longer have access to classroom given that I'm no longer in high school, nor do I use this website. I am still happy to help where I can, but as of now, consider this code deprecated.

A darker Google Classroom style. Feel free to edit or suggest edits, not only is Classroom quite difficult to code, but it updates its styles frequently so I likely missed a few spots (one that I know of). I figured I may as well construct a somewhat organized theme for people to work from and possibly improve upon for now.
info.additionalInfo:
You can contribute to this style or report an issue on Github here: https://github.com/Raeffion/FireFoxCSS/tree/master/Google%20Classroom%20Dark

Credit to Conner Farrant for pioneering the dark themed Classroom styles
(https://userstyles.org/users/342864)

---------------------------------

[FIX] 12/1/2017: Made buttons gray

---------------------------------

Please report bugs and/or make new feature suggestions!

Keywords: firefox, chrome, google, classroom, flat, dark, black, design, style, theme, Raeffion
